Segment.name: EFI
Segment.comment: To provide basic information about the electronic format of the interchange data

Field.name: SecurityLevelCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the level of confidentiality assigned by the sender to the information following

Field.name: SecurityTechniqueCode
Field.comment: Code indicating that this element will be used to tell an EDI translator program which security technique to use

Field.name: VersionIdentifier1
Field.comment: Revision level of a particular format, program, technique or algorithm

Field.name: ProgramIdentifier
Field.comment: Identifies the name of the software program from which the technical data originates

Field.name: VersionIdentifier2
Field.comment: Revision level of a particular format, program, technique or algorithm

Field.name: InterchangeFormat
Field.comment: Industry or proprietary standard used to identify the format of the data

Field.name: VersionIdentifier3
Field.comment: Revision level of a particular format, program, technique or algorithm

Field.name: CompressionTechnique
Field.comment: Identifies the digital data compression means and the type

Field.name: DrawingSheetSizeCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the drawing size and orientation of a technical drawing as specified and described in the current version of standards ANSI Y14.1 and ISO 5457 (E); see the listed ANSI and ISO standards for the maximum lengths for rolled sheets *

Field.name: FileName
Field.comment: Name assigned or declared for a file or used by a program to identify a file; exact format of the name depends on the computer operating system being used; name also may be known as the file's "data set name"

Field.name: BlockType
Field.comment: Organization of a data block such as fixed length, variable length, spanned, etc. Synonym for "data format"

Field.name: RecordLength
Field.comment: Quantity of characters or bytes in a record. Synonyms are "logical record length" and "record size"

Field.name: BlockLength
Field.comment: Quantity of data elements in a block, usually specified in units such as records, words or characters; synonym for "block size"

Field.name: VersionIdentifier4
Field.comment: Revision level of a particular format, program, technique or algorithm

Field.name: FilterIdCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the type of filter used to convert data code values
